channel.title: Dungeoneering Group
channel.description:
I started Dungeoneering a few days ago, and it is really boring and slow when doing solos, so I'd figured I could look for teammates here. If you are interested in joining a five man team, please send me a message in-game.
RS Name: Hoox
TO prevent this topic from being locked, talk about your favorite methods of training dungeoneering. (Solo/Party, levels, complexity, other tactics)

item.title: Dungeoneering Group
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:31, topic:466272”][quote author=Kidpaparoach link=topic=578919.msg4156203#msg4156203 date=1352705362]

you lot should go for the items from dom tower, they all are better/equal to the items from daemonheim.

What’s a better stab weapon than a rapier? It was under my understanding that the gloves are crush. I’ve never been to dom tower, though.

The bonuses of the gloves = same as the maul which are tied for the highest overall melee weapon i.e. dual rapiers.
Although obviously some npcs are weaker to stab than crush the difference is big enough for me to say in my opinion at least that the gloves > anything else exl cmaul stats wise.
I remember watching castle wars (?) video on it.
Also, to answer your original question, vesta spear. Vls possibly, and cls stats wise.
[/quote]
I’m talking about dps. Most slayer monsters are weak to stab which is why I haven’t bothered to do dom tower. CLS is also quite slow compared to rapier.[/quote]
I can’t really remember, I think the maul has a higher overall DPS in the beta too. JJust watched a video, the gloves are getting made back into gloves rather than weapons.

Read full topic

I’m talking about dps. Most slayer monsters are weak to stab which is why I haven’t bothered to do dom tower. CLS is also quite slow compared to rapier.

item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

The Wanderer:

Ill dung with you when the update comes out. Me and two friends are going to on the weekends. I’m going for a second rapier for dual wielding and the are going for maul/cls.

I completely forgot about the new wielding abilities. I hope Jagex changes around the prices for single-handed weapons.

Read full topic

item.title: Dungeoneering Group
item.dc:creator: @kingcobra805 kingcobra805
item.description:
@kingcobra805 wrote:

[quote=“Kidpaparoach, post:22, topic:466272”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=578919.msg4152007#msg4152007 date=1352489731]

it is impossible with the very best gear stats etc to do a c1 in 30seconds…
opening doors alone has like a 1-2second delay lol.
[/quote]which would make it possible…?
you can have a 4-5 room dg

so… 4 x 2 = 8 seconds, 2 hit = 1 second = 9 second== profit?? if somebody is always keying

No, not doing a room. Literally opening a door, it has a delay opening using key on it etc…[/quote]

lol let alone the time to open the other doors, even if you had the best team in rs you have 0% chance of doing a 15 second c1. you have what, about 6-7 rooms to open up on a c1? thats more than 15 seconds right there.

Read full topic

item.title: Dungeoneering Group
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:19, topic:466272”][quote author=Kidpaparoach link=topic=578919.msg4151750#msg4151750 date=1352478003]
it is impossible with the very best gear stats etc to do a c1 in 30seconds…
opening doors alone has like a 1-2second delay lol.
[/quote]which would make it possible…?
you can have a 4-5 room dg

so… 4 x 2 = 8 seconds, 2 hit = 1 second = 9 second== profit?? if somebody is always keying[/quote]
No, not doing a room. Literally opening a door, it has a delay opening using key on it etc…

Read full topic

item.title: Dungeoneering Group
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:20, topic:466272”][quote author=Tutorial link=topic=578919.msg4147067#msg4147067 date=1352250093]
I started Dungeoneering a few days ago, and it is really boring and slow when doing solos, so I’d figured I could look for teammates here. If you are interested in joining a five man team, please send me a message in-game.

RS Name: Hoox

TO prevent this topic from being locked, talk about your favorite methods of training dungeoneering. (Solo/Party, levels, complexity, other tactics)
[/quote]
Why do you train something that you find boring [/quote]
I said it was boring when I played by myself, which is the reason I posted this. I guess people are too concerned with selling floors and other stuff that is exactly the opposite of what I was looking for.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

have you never seen the ice behemoth like two hitted before?

if people use ovl/turm…they can hit into the 700’s with a p2h.

I don’t remember the 1:1 ice behemoth hp but I am almost certain it’s possible for a 2 hit ko

item.title: Dungeoneering Group
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:6, topic:466272”]nah, when we do c1 rushing hex keyers at least would try to maximize c1 xp for the person so instead of 1:1 we would do 1:2 for the monsters levels.

Due to this a floor averaged 2:15-2:30

but, keep in mind a person would make about 600 xp on a floor in a c1 at lower dg levels, so on on the higher settings it was common to make 1.2k ish every floor which isn’t bad for their dg level[/quote]

i’m just waiting for that 15 second c1 you claimed to achieve a bit back

Read full topic
